mapper.select: SELECT name FROM sys_role WHERE id IN ( SELECT role_id FROM sys_userrole WHERE user_id =#{id} )

SELECT menu.*, ( SELECT COUNT( 1 ) FROM sys_menu WHERE parentid = menu.id ) AS cnt FROM sys_menu menu INNER JOIN ( SELECT menurole.menu_id FROM sys_menurole menurole INNER JOIN sys_role role ON role.id = menurole.role_id INNER JOIN sys_userrole userrole ON userrole.role_id = role.id WHERE userrole.user_id = #{userId} AND role.STATUS = '1' GROUP BY menurole.menu_id ) menurole ON menurole.menu_id = menu.id WHERE menu.STATUS = '1' AND menu.type = '1' ORDER BY menu.sortkey ASC
